collaborationkit-desc: Tools for building WikiProjects and on-wiki collaborative workspaces
createhubfeature: Create a new Collaboration Hub feature
collaborationkit-createhub-exists: A page already exists with the specified title.
collaborationkit-createhub-nopermission: You do not have permission to create a Collaboration Hub with this title
collaborationkit-createhub-confirm: Yes, overwrite the current page contents
collaborationkit-createhub-confirmheader: There is already a page with this title. If you confirm below, the contents of that page will be overwritten. Would you like to proceed?
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-conten: What type of page is this?
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-invali: You have chosen an invalid page title.
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-exists: A page already exists at the title you specified.
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-noperm: You do not have permission to create a feature with this title.
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-hubdoe: A Collaboration Hub does not exist at this title.
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-noperm: You do not have permission to create a feature with this content model.
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-hubisn: The page you specified is not a Collaboration Hub.
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-invali: This content model is not permitted for features at this time.
collaborationkit-iconlist-intro: These are the pre-packaged icons that can be used on Collaboration Hubs. Each icon name in the table corresponds to the keyword used in the Collaboration Hub editing interface to select the icon.
collaborationkit-list-isempty: This list has no columns or items.
collaborationkit-list-emptycolumn: This column has no items in it.
collaborationkit-list-invalid: This content does not meet the requirements of the CollaborationListContent schema. This may happen as a result of a software update. The content is reproduced below.
collaborationkit-list-notlist: [[$1]] is not a Collaboration List page
collaborationkit-list-toomanytags: You are not allowed to specify more than {{PLURAL:$1|one tag|$1 tags}}.
collaborationkit-list-delete-popup: Saved: $1 was deleted from the list.
collaborationkit-list-alreadyadded: You are already a member of this project.
collaborationkit-list-error-editconflict: There was an edit conflict, and your change was not saved. Please refresh the page and try again.
collaborationkit-list-error-couldnotgetp: The page failed to load. Please refresh the page and try again.
collaborationkit-list-error-generic: There was an error. Please refresh the page and try again.
collaborationkit-list-error-saving: Your edits to the list were not saved. Please refresh the page and try again.
collaborationkit-hub-announcements-initi: A new Collaboration Hub has been set up!
collaborationkit-hub-members-description: Our members are below. Those who have not edited in over a month are moved to the inactive section.
collaborationkit-hub-missingpage-note: This feature does not exist. You can create a new feature using the button below. If you just created the feature and you're still seeing this message, try purging the cache.
collaborationkit-hub-missingpage-protect: This feature likely does not exist, and has been protected from creation. Or you can try purging the cache.
collaborationkit-hub-invalid: This content does not meet the requirements of the CollaborationHubContent schema. This may happen as a result of a software update. The content is reproduced below.
collaborationkit-createhub-wrongnamespac: This page name cannot be used as a Collaboration Hub. Collaboration Hubs can only be created in the {{PLURAL:$1|$2 namespace|following namespaces: $2}}.
createcollaborationhub-text: You are creating a new Collaboration Hub, a workspace for organizing a project. Once this page is created, you will be able to add features and make other edits.
collaborationkit-createhub-title-help: Where to create the Collaboration Hub
collaborationkit-hubedit-displayname-hel: Used to refer to the project on other pages. Only needed if different from the page title.
collaborationkit-hubedit-hubtheme-help: The hub's visual identity, including an identifying picture and a main color.
collaborationkit-hubedit-image-help: An image or icon to represent the project
collaborationkit-hubedit-introduction-pl: Introduce your project here! Tell us what you want to do.
collaborationkit-hubedit-footer-help: Appears beneath the included features. Recommended location for categories, navigation templates, etc.
collaborationkit-hubedit-content-help: A list of pages or subpages to include in the project. One page name per line. Use the full page titles.
collaborationkit-listedit-description-pl: Describe what the list is about or for.
collaborationkit-listedit-list-help: Custom syntax is used for bulk editing. Essentially, one item for line, with different columns marked by several hyphens. Visit the [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:CollaborationKit|help page]] for more information.
collaborationkit-createhubfeature-icon-h: Please choose from the included icons.
